- Skills section with levels and experience

- Reviews section with star ratings

- Button (4 variants: primary, secondary, outline, ghost)
- Card (3 variants with animations)
- Badge (5 variants)
- Input (with label and error handling)
- TalentCard (reusable talent display)
- SkillBadge (skill with level indicators)
- ReputationScore (rating with stars)

- TypeScript interfaces (Talent, Skill, Review, etc.)

- Reviews with real comments
